title: Riot pls read this it's important
body:
Since you didn't help when I send you 2 emails and told what's the problem I have to write it here.

So for 1 week ago i send you my first email because someone logged in my account and I send you a email and asked how to change my password and you, Riot, didn't answer me and now i'm perma banned!?
So after I got banned I send you another email where you actually responded this time but you didn't help me how to get my account back or what's going on. you just said '' The suspension on your account was placed due to security reasons :D '' what???????????????????????????????????
I asked for a new password, not close my account down what the fuck, Riot? 
Btw. check my chat plus my behavior for 1 month, week ago I don't flame plus I don't afk. Actually I fought to hard to get to gold after so long so I don't wanna be banned after all the hard work I did to get finally gold

Please just open my account again I got a lot in that account

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted support tickets about this issue, I recommend you continue to work with the specialist you were put in touch with. That will be the easiest pathway to resolve this situation entirely.

Let me know if you have any questions.

what if they don't Answer? I mean I send a message but I got no responds? 
what do I do?

Response times are a bit longer than normal due to a large influx of tickets, but you'll definitely get a reply as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other concerns.
